actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to prevent the denial of Federal assistance to units of general local government which refuse to associate with other such units in certain "councils of government" and similar entities.

summary.text: Prevents the denial of Federal assistance to units of general local government which refuse to associate with other such units in "councils of government" and similar entities, where such unit of general local government is not bound by State law to so join such council.

titles.title: A bill to prevent the denial of Federal assistance to units of general local government which refuse to associate with other such units in certain "councils of government" and similar entities.
